# v0.10.7

## 🚀 Features

- SfModal modified to work without js
- atom components refactor to functional:
  - SfBreadcrumbs
  - SfBullet
  - SfButton
  - SfColor
  - SfHeading
  - SfIcon
  - SfLink
  - SfQuantitySelector
  - SfRating
  - SfSkeleton
  - SfTextarea

## 🐛 Fixes

- SfAccordion - header text should be aligned left when multiline
